string-array.name: help_child_Bizy
string-array.item: Manage profiles that will automatically control the volume levels on your phone throughout the week
You can view the list of profiles you have created on the Home page
You can also toggle between turning the profile on or off

string-array.name: help_child_create
string-array.item: From the home page, tap the + button
To save changes, tap the check button
To discard changes, just hit the trash or back button

string-array.name: help_child_edit
string-array.item: Tap on an existing profile from the home page
Make changes to the profile details
To save changes, tap the check button
To discard changes, tap the back button

string-array.name: help_child_delete
string-array.item: Tap on an existing profile from the home page
To delete the profile, tap the trash button
